alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:46PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 442 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northeast of Tonto National Monument, or 19 miles northeast of Roosevelt, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Roosevelt, San Carlos, Miami, Tonto Basin, Apache Lake, and Canyon Lake. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 235 and 287. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 271. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 162 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If boating, quickly get off of the water and into a safe location. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
